definition: to make reference to/to write about
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)
and/to reach/up to/in time for

sentences.english: The relation between the remand for new trial and the principle of no appeal resulting in additional punishment is seldom discussed before.
sentences.chinese: 发回重审和上诉不加刑原则的关系问题很少有人论及。

sentences.english: In addition, some problems in the control of vibration and noise are discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 作者还论及振动和噪音的控制等问题。

sentences.english: In addition, some problems in the control of vibration and noise are discussed in this…
sentences.chinese: 作者还论及振动和噪音的控制等问题。

sentences.english: Common ownership, Aristotle argues, will mean a sort of common neglect.
sentences.chinese: 亚里士多德论及，共同所有权等同于一种共同的疏漏。

sentences.english: Its wide coverage and originality are the typical traits.
sentences.chinese: 论及范围宽泛，富于创见性，是这部著作的显著特点。

sentences.english: Suddenly, they touched the subject of God. The barber said
sentences.chinese: 突然，他们论及到了上帝这个话题。

sentences.english: The Library of Congress holds more than 700 books on the subject of the White House.
sentences.chinese: 美国国会图书倌藏有超过700本论及白宫的书。

sentences.english: There aren ' t many theories about landscape sketching in ancient china.
sentences.chinese: 在中国历代画论中，论及山水画写生的不多。

sentences.english: The potential produced by a charge distribution on the self affine set and its analytic properties are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了关于自仿集上电荷分布的势论及有关分析性质。

sentences.english: A few points of view with resepect to the application of sinusoidal excitation to the modal analysis are also…
sentences.chinese: 文章也论及在模态分析中采用正弦激振的一些观点。

sentences.english: It's no doubt that this fruit is "top banana" when it comes to triggering happiness.
sentences.chinese: 论及刺激幸福感的水果，那可就非香蕉莫属了。

sentences.english: However, solid state dosimetry with thermoluminescent materials is also included .
sentences.chinese: 然而，也论及使用热释光材料的固体剂量学。

sentences.english: A few points of view with resepect to the application of sinusoidal excitation to the modal analysis are also discussed in this…
sentences.chinese: 文章也论及在模态分析中采用正弦激振的一些观点。

sentences.english: However, solid state dosimetry with thermoluminescent materials is also included.
sentences.chinese: 然而，也论及使用热释光材料的固体剂量学。

sentences.english: Chapter Four talked over the style criticism of The West Chamber in Ming and its remained questions.
sentences.chinese: 第四章评价明清《西厢记》风格论及存在的问题。

sentences.english: That magazine covers all kinds of heating apparatuses.
sentences.chinese: 那本杂志论及所有暖气装置。

definition: needless to say/it goes without saying
to excel/to surpass
lit. to have no time for civilities (idiom)/fig. not to be outdone/not to yield to one's opponents
to compare/to draw a parallel/to match/analogy/metaphor/comparison
as many as/no less than/not inferior to/as good as/on a par with
the present age/in office/the current office holder
first-class
that being the case/then/in that case
fall short by a large amount
nevertheless/although
equally matched/about the same
second after/second only to
something that everybody knows
well-matched/equally matched
refined/profound
to not need dwell on (idiom)
